chapter.title: Running the Example
chapter.para: To run the example, start the JBOSS AS container and access its jmx-console.

note.para: jboss.bind.address and port depends on how the container is started. The default port is 8080 and can be accessed as follows: http://127.0.0.1:8080/jmx-console

chapter.para: Look for the bean named as: org.mobicents.slee:name=SleeConnectivityExample and invoke its operations. Pass distinct argument to operation. If the operation is successful, passed value will be shown in &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Console
